Text:
Excellent, contains RealDrums Set 2 !!
(hope this one work)
Do you have RealDrums Set 1 and RealDrums Set 3 as well? Can you share them to?
Great Work. Do I need a serial key? I cannot see one within files?

Sorry I am stuck! What shall I do with the rarfile?
How do I install? plz help me!
Download Winrar to uncompress a rar file, then you can see the files inside and instal from there.

Hey
Download and unpack with rar, but now I got to bin-files. What shall I do with these?? Please help !
Soory I ment two binfiles, and nothing else - no exefile or instalfile
Yeah im having the same problem, every other time ive used winrar ive had an instal file

bin files are image files. you open them with a program that recognizes bin/cue files. usually their is a .cue file with the .bin file but the .cue file is not needed in most cases. You cannot just copy the file to a cd. you have to use a program designed for that like nero. Magic iso may handle bins. alchohol120% maybe. try searching for bin in applications and see if it finds a mounting program.
Excellent! Many thanks for this one.
thanks, but why not share these in some sensible manner, like .iso or at least include cue files?

For those of you confused by the "bin" files...

I used WinRar to "un-rar" the rar files then used MagicIso 5.3 to burn the CDs from the bin files.

CD 1 is the Band in a Box program, CD 2 is the "real Drums" expansion.

The real drums sound awesome!

Easy install, no serial number.  Everything works!!

Great up load.

I'll seed at night when not using the computer.

Once I figured out how to use the 2 bin files to burn the 2 disks (I used Toast on my Mac since my numerous attempts under Windoz proved fruitless!) the whole thing installed flawlessly and works just great! Thanks!
